data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 1,143 believers living in Vlorë, Albania.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vlorë, Albania
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Vlorë, Albania and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 165 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 1,143 believers in Vlorë.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Vlorë, Albania.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Gorani people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Vlorë, Albania to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Vlorë to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Vlorë, Albania so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

location.name: Vlorë
location.people_groups_list: Deaf, Turk, Romani, Vlax, Albanian, Egyptian, Balkan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Deaf (14,000), Turk (1,700), Romani, Vlax (7,200), Albanian (2,725,000), Egyptian, Balkan (2,900)
